Title: The Harsh Light of Day
Plot: Spike returns to Sunnydale with his new girlfriend Harmony who is now also a vampire. Spike is searching for the Gem of Amara - a stone which makes vampires invulnerable, which he believes is buried somewhere under Sunnydale. Buffy is preoccupied with her budding relationship with Parker and sleeps with him but he proceeds to ignore her. Meanwhile Anya returns and throws herself at a flabbergasted Xander.
GuestStars: Jason Hall, Adam Kaufman, Melik, Emma Caulfield, Mercedes McNab, James Marsters
